sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>true</before>
        <description>Promotes ast_service fields to ast_contract</description>
        <name>Promote ast_service fields</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var AST_SERVICE = "ast_service";
	var AST_CONTRACT = "ast_contract";
	var CUSTOMER = "customer";
	var COVERS = "covers";

	// Check ast_service exists
	var astService = new GlideRecord(AST_SERVICE);
	if (!astService.isValid())
		return;

	// Promote the columns
	GlideDBUtil.promoteColumn(AST_SERVICE, AST_CONTRACT, CUSTOMER);
	GlideDBUtil.promoteColumn(AST_SERVICE, AST_CONTRACT, COVERS);
})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-01-25 12:07:51</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>83cc3154b713230034d1da23ee11a97b</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Promote ast_service fields</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Contract Management - Form Layouts and Behavior" source="com.snc.contract_management.form_layouts">3018f8ec3cb1311068bcf327dfe37f71</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_83cc3154b713230034d1da23ee11a97b</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-01-25 12:11:19</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
